properties.text: (almost) traffic free in Zone C, now we wait for #Sandy 's dramatic arrival http://t.co/Pjo6OCF2
Still no sign of #Sandy other than eerie stillness of Lower Manhattan
@Wilderness_of_T thanks.  It is a bit spooky.  Even the OWSers in front of Trinity Church for months are now gone #sandy
Loud wheezing of winds just woke me up #sandy is here
WTC, an hour ago in Lower Manhattan #sandy http://t.co/edEmDA0o
WTC, now in Lower Manhattan #sandy http://t.co/RGNYIGqG
Ok, power officially out.  I know this for sure because frat boy neighbors just let out loud screams of "fucccccck!" #sandy #zonecisout
Zone C in the darkness of #Sandy , all is quiet except sirens against backdrop of wind howls http://t.co/zEHNAmQT
@Wilderness_of_T or zombies. I prefer shaun of the dead but I guess wrong country. #sandy
@Wilderness_of_T not from my fl unfortunately. Can do from rooftop but elevator is out; so are lights in staircase. Oooo zombies #sandy
Nard!  I think they turned off water too.  This was not part of the deal. #Sandy
@Wilderness_of_T East is too far, maybe Hudson, jk. Am sure they locked rooftop. Though was sure they would tell me if no water #fail #sandy
@Wilderness_of_T too many candles for clumsy me to be drinkin anything but apple juice, which looks exactly like wine atm #cheers #sandy
Wonder what @simonpegg thinks about all the Shaun of the Dead references in this #Frankenstorm #Sandy #whatwouldshaundo
Power still out in lower Manhattan. Woke up and played with SLR, need to learn how to set exp>30" #darkness #sandy http://t.co/BLuVKI58
Is there an ethical way of dyeing your hair?  http://t.co/ygmXvwXW #greenliving
Apparently power came back to apt last Wed pm but I didnt find out since couldn't get through to the mgmt or nearby stores on phone #sandy
Walked across BK Bridge to work on Wed, intended on cabbing to parents in QN after but couldn't reserve one #sandy http://t.co/5aIcRKUa
Took lovely friend's offer to crash in Crowne Heights, walked an hour via Fulton, Atlantic, Flatbush, past many long lines for buses #sandy
Lucked out on Thur as trains were running intra-boroughs, got to work in 30 mins (including coffee & bagel pick up) #sandy
Superpapa to the rescue on Thur night as he braved BQE to venture into unknown BK territory and picked me up, BQE traffic free #sandy
Drivers regulated themselves at crossings as some traffic lights were out, blocks of lit houses would be followed by unlit ones #sandy
Half of our house is without power, superpapa ran wires for fridge, also computer so I was able to work from home on Friday #spoiled #sandy
On friend front, last one to regain power was in Chinatown (by Friday pm) everything up and running except his precious internet #sandy
@NathanFGao keep it going keep it going full steam!
Last piece of #sandy news, lovely Crowne Heights friend is supposed to run marathon tmr, will instead be volunteering, bless her!
ConEd said about 900+ households around me are without power so they had to shut everything down in order to restore for all. No ETA #sandy
power back to half to house after 7 hours outage #sandy no ETA on the missing half
@Scientist07 but it's getting to be so cold!!! Is C back from DC yet?
@Scientist07 hey power restored 100% !  Noticed nearby houses are back on grid as well.  Check on your mom!
Voted!  Fellow Americans, did you? http://t.co/DK5CwB4k
@lehcarab @runnerbird didn't you teach me the way of the Z train? Or was it someone else?
@Scientist07 hooray!  Now go out there and vote (if you haven't done so already)!
